subject: Drug Abuse and Traffic
lead_paragraph: A federal judge in Norfolk, Va., denied bond for the former star Tim Montgomery on federal heroin distribution charges. Montgomery appeared in United States District Court and pleaded not guilty to the charges and requested a jury trial, which the judge set for July 9.
